questionCopy: Is your community LGBTQ friendly?
If a gay couple moves into your community, can they take advantage of the second person rate?
Are there any other gay residents in your community?
Do you have openly gay employees in the facility?
Do you have male Certified Nursing Assistants?
Do you have female Certified Nursing Assistants?
Are there any recreational activities geared toward the LGBTQ population?
Do you have all male residents in this facility?
Do you have all female residents in this facility?
Is your facility both male and female?
Are there any transgender residents in your facility?
Can 2 men share an accommodation?
Can 2 women share an accommodation?
Can the Resident leave the facility for a specific event?
Are there any gay organizations involved with your facility?
According to your knowledge, are there any gay organizations close to your facility?
Do you have a discrimination policy at your facility?
Do you have a policy concerning two men or two women holding hands?
Does the facility have a policy on LGBTQ? (Lesbian, Gay, Bi-sexual,Transgender or Questioning/Queer)
Is transportation available for evening events outside of the facility?
Is there an extra cost for that transportation?
Do you have a group in your facility for gay residents? (as in Italian Club, Yiddish Club, etc.)
If you do, how often do they meet?
Do you have a confidentiality policy in your facility?
In your opinion, would a gay resident be comfortable in your facility?
